FuncDef: This command enters the context to configure group ranges which are translated to SSM (S,G) entries. If the static entry needs to be created, it has to be translated from a IGMPv1 IGMPv2 request to a Source Specific Multicast (SSM) join. An SSM translate source can only be added if thestargcommand is not enabled. An error message is generated if you try to configure thesourcecommand withstargcommand enabled.
